experience: You and Leif both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Curtis Gunn, and 38 others
Collaboration can Increase Revenues and Reach New Clients - Bolste | Collaboration, Business and Video Chat, File Sharing & Task Management Software

My company Bolste.com is the new Business Operating System (BOS) for businesses. It replaces countless apps, is easy to use and can increase employee productivity as much as 25%. I am the past Founder and President of TruQuest Corporation, a consulting company that conducted business programs in 70 US and Canadian cities. Previously I was Sr. V.P. for RBC Wealth Management in Tucson Arizona and was a Nationally Awarded Investment Advisor. I taught post graduate programs at the University of Arizona in Finance. I am a published author of many articles and educational programs, a past Chairman of the Board of the American Heart Association in Tucson,Az and served on several foundation boards including Tucson Medical Center Foundation. I'm an avid fly fisherman and the proud father of two daughters.

Truquest was a business coaching company that specialized in the Small Business. Our high end courses tought participants to dramatically increase their income and balance their lives.TruQuest has instructed over 10,000 people in over 70 cities throughout the US and Canada.My experience with small business allowed me to form my current company and provide the technology through BizAnytime.com to small businesses everywhere.

I’ve known Glenn for many years and had the opportunity to observe him through his many successes as his career has steadily advanced and I highly recommend him. He is a strategic thinker who provides clear vision and direction to his teams, which he leads with perseverance and passion. He is able to readily translate strategy into tactics that create value for customers and his organization. Glenn is a life-long learner who is always seeking to improve, grow and is driven to achieve. He is an excellent communicator, who is equally effective influencing the highest levels of leadership and front line contributors. He is a very mindful leader who is there to help his team members as well as friends. His commitment to developing his team and seeing them move on to greater responsibilities and challenges is a real source of pride for him.
